title: Time with God

welcome.title: A space for you and God
welcome.content: In the midst of noise, there is a place where you can breathe, pray and listen to His voice. This is your space.

inspiration.title: Time that transforms
inspiration.content: Dedicating a few minutes each day can change your heart, your mind and your life. Do you want to discover how?

timeSelection.title: How much time do you want to dedicate to God?
timeSelection.content: It doesn't matter if it's 5 or 30 minutes, the important thing is to start and be consistent.

motivation.title: How do you want to connect today?
motivation.contentCustom:
Choose the way that brings you closer: reading, music or silence in prayer.

Each personalized moment with God is unique and valuable.

finish.title: Your journey begins today
finish.content: What you sow in this time with God will bear fruit in your life. This is your beginning!
